name: DropdownMenu
purpose: Present a discoverable list of actions or choices triggered by a button.
useWhen: User needs to choose an action from a short list
Actions are related to the trigger
rules: Each item performs a single action or selection
doNotUseWhen: Inputs or complex layouts are required (use Popover)
Confirmation or multi-step flows are needed (use Modal)
aiHints: DropdownMenu is for choosing actions, not configuring settings
Do not place form fields inside a DropdownMenu
